name: AT Missile Launcher, Disposable, Modified (ModDaTL-14)
description: A modified version of the disposable anti-tank missile launcher. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
